name: churchtools-label-manager
description: Advanced tag management interface for ChurchTools with enhanced UI, bulk operations, and comprehensive tag management capabilities

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run package
scripts.package: npm run package:zip && npm run package:info
scripts.package:zip: zip -r ct-labelmanager-v$npm_package_version.zip index.html module.json README.md DEPLOYMENT.md
scripts.package:info: npm run package:size && npm run package:contents
scripts.validate: npm run validate:module && npm run validate:html
scripts.validate:module: node -e "const m=require('./module.json'); console.log('✅ module.json valid:', m.name, 'v' + m.version)"
scripts.validate:html: test -f index.html && echo '✅ index.html exists' || echo '❌ index.html missing'
scripts.dev:open: npm run dev & sleep 2 && open http://localhost:8080
scripts.release: npm run validate && npm run build && npm run release:info
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run update:module-version
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run update:module-version
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run update:module-version
scripts.update:module-version: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const pkg=require('./package.json'); const mod=require('./module.json'); mod.version=pkg.version; fs.writeFileSync('module.json', JSON.stringify(mod, null, 2))"

author: ChurchTools Community
